TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: We Are ODST

Articles.Content:
Since my ODST videos for Kerbal Space Program are my most popular by far I decided to try another one using some mods besides tsarcorp's wonderful SOEIV mod. I wish it was still being worked on, it's last release was for 0.18 so it could definitely use some work, but I'm glad it worked well enough to make this video. Enjoy!

If you have any questions just let me know!
